```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

We will 10 weekly assignments, 1 midterm and a final project in this class. The placement of these are located in the [schedule](schedule.html).

Assignments are to be turned in on Blackboard. Assignment will be available no later then 3 weeks before class and are due to be turned in on the following Sunday. Specific times can be found no Blackboard. The assignment will contain a mix of conceptual, technical and coding exercises.

The midterm and final project will follow a different schedule specified on Blackboard.
